text: Nickelodeon Digital, often shortened to Nick Digital and originally known as Nickelodeon Creative Labs, is an American animation studio based in New York City. ==List of productions== * Natalie's Backseat Traveling Web Show (1996) * Blue's Clues (1996–2004) * Little Bill (1999–2004) * Garbage Boy (1999) * Nick Jr. Just for Me Stories (2001) * 2001 Kids' Choice Awards (animated graphics) * Backyardigans Pilot (2001) * Feetface (Noggin idents; 2002–2003) * 2002 Kids' Choice Awards (Jimmy Neutron and SpongeBob SquarePants segments) * Play with Me Sesame (2002–2007) * Gary the Rat (2003) * 2003 Kids' Choice Awards (The Fairly OddParents segments) * Stripperella (additional CGI animation; 2003–2004) * This Just In! (2004) * Blue's Room (2004–2007) * Unfabulous (2004-2007; main title digital animation/graphics) * Chickiepoo and Fluff: Barnyard Detectives (2007) * Nicktoons Film Festival 5 (opening & bumpers; 2008) * Bubble Guppies (2011–2016; 2019–present) * Charlie and Mr. Two (short film; 2013) * Wallykazam! (2014–2017) * Dora and Friends: Into the City! (2014–2017) * Shimmer and Shine (2015–2020) ===Visual effects and on-air promos=== * SpongeBob SquarePants (1999–present) * Face (Nick Jr. idents; 1994–1996, 2000–2003) * Dora the Explorer (2000–2014) * The Fairly OddParents (2001–2017) * Invader Zim (2001–2006) * The Alan Brady Show (2003) * The Lizzie McGuire Movie (2003) *Danny Phantom (2004-2007) * Avatar: The Last Airbender (2005–2008) * Catscratch (2005–2007) * The X's (2005–2006) * Holly Hobbie & Friends (2006–2009) * Random! Cartoons (2006–2007) * El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (2007–2008) * Tak and the Power of Juju (2007–2009) * Ni Hao, Kai-Lan (2007–2011) * The Mighty B! (2008–2011) * The Penguins of Madagascar (2008–2012) * Fanboy & Chum Chum (2009–2012) * T.U.F.F. Puppy (2010–2015) * Winx Club (2011–2016) * Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (2011–2016) * Robot and Monster (2012–2014) * Sanjay and Craig (2013–2016) * Welcome to the Wayne (2014, 2017–2019) * Breadwinners (2014–2016) * Harvey Beaks (2015–2017) * Pig Goat Banana Cricket (2015–2018) * The Loud House (2016–present) * Bunsen Is a Beast (2017–2018) * T.U.F.F. Puppy: The Movie (2017) * The Loud House: Lincoln Louds' First Movie (2017) * Hey Arnold!: The Jungle Movie (2017) * Rocko's Modern Life: Static Cling (2019) * Invader Zim: Enter the Florpus (2019) * The Casagrandes (2019–present) * The Loud House Movie (2021) ==References== ==Other websites== * Nickelodeon Digital Category:Nickelodeon Category:American animation studios Category:Companies based in Burbank, California
title: Nickelodeon Digital
